overview: "Nadia's Songs" follows a teenage boy who finds a collection of CDs that used to belong to a stranger known only as Nadia. In their shared taste in music he imagines her life story while in turn reflecting on his own. One part essay and one part love letter to second hand music shops, "Nadia's Songs" explores the many ways we can forge our identities through the art we consume and things we collect as young adults.

production_companies.name: Liason of Independent Filmmakers of Toronto

title: Nadia's Songs
